task.title: Creating an OAuth security definition
task.shortdesc: Create an OAuth security definition to control accesses to an API through the OAuth authorization standard.

context.p:
You can create an OAuth security definition that uses one of the following flows according to the OAuth grant type that you want to enforce. The following table shows the different types of OAuth flow and the corresponding OAuth grant types: OAuth flow and corresponding OAuth grant type
OAuth flow OAuth grant type
Access code Authorization Code
Application Client Credentials
Implicit Implicit OAuth
Password Resource Owner Password Credentials

step.cmd: From the search results, select API Security OAuth.
Select the OAuth flow to use.
Specify the scopes that you want to cover access to your API.

taskbody.postreq: To enforce the security scheme, add the OAuth security definition into a security requirement of an API or operation.
